PGD-663 Living Together with Ray: Spending Intimate Moments with the Perfect Girlfriend from Her Perspective

pgd-663 None 0 min

Actresses

Ray

Categories

POV Solo Work Exclusive Mosaic HD

Publisher

Premium

Description

"OMG! I just discovered this insanely cute virtual cohabitation project with Ray-chan! Her playful little expressions and that ridiculously hot body are totally my type~ From waking up to her morning greetings to falling asleep with her goodnight whispers, you get to be glued to her all day long. This sweet domestic fantasy is seriously addictive! I can't help wanting to relive that heart-fluttering feeling over and over—you guys HAVE to try this!"

Fan Review

**PGD-663 Review: Living Together with Ray (or: How My Laptop Screen Almost Melted) 🔥** --- ### **Why I Clicked It**

Okay, so… *deep breath* I was *supposed* to be studying for my midterms (lol, as if), but my brain was fried and my thumb had a mind of its own.

Scrolling, scrolling—*BAM*. Ray’s stupidly cute face fills my screen, all big eyes and that *"I’m your gf but also a lowkey menace"* smirk.

The title *"Living Together with Ray"* hit me like, *"Oh, this is gonna be a PROBLEM. "* POV? Check.

GF vibes? Check. That *"薄格"* tag hinting at *just* enough teasing before the good stuff? *SOLD. * I clicked so fast my Wi-Fi whimpered.

--- ### **What Made Me Lose My Mind** FIRST OF ALL—the *morning scene*. Ray waking up next to "you" (aka the camera, aka *me*, delulu mode activated), hair messy, stretching like a cat… and then she *nuzzles into the pillow* with this giggle that’s 50% sweet, 50% *"I know what I’m doing to you.

"* The way she bites her lip when she "catches" you staring? *DEAD. * But the REAL felony was the *kitchen counter moment*.

She’s pretending to cook (adorable), turns around, and suddenly it’s *full eye contact*, hands sliding up her own thighs like she’s daring you to stop her.

Then—*ugh*—the way she arches into the POV when things get… *distracted*. That *"ah… really? here? "* whisper?

The counter *definitely* got more action than the food. I had to pause. *Twice. * --- ### **Afterthoughts**

Currently: a puddle. A *happy*, slightly flustered puddle. Ray’s vibe is *dangerously* girlfriend-coded—like, if this was a rom-com, I’d be shipping us.

The POV had me *actually* blushing (*"why am I covering my mouth? NO ONE’S HERE"*), and now I’m side-eyeing my empty bed like… *hm.

* Lowkey bookmarked. *Highkey* might rewatch before bed. *"For research. "* **#POVMagic #GFExperienceWho #RayIsTheStandard #CounterTopAppreciation**

**PS:** If my roommate asks, this was a documentary about *"urban living. "* 😇
